statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -1 \\ -1 \\ 0 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 3 \\ -1 \\ -3 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ 8 \\ 0 \\ -6 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -10 \\ -17 \\ -1 \\ 12 \\ 6 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
